altername_name: Titus the Fox to Marrakech and Back
name: Titus the Fox
overview: Sultan Rabys kidnaps Foxy while she is traveling in the Sahara Desert in search of the elusive desert fox. The Sultan subsequently challenges Titus the fox to rescue her. You take control of Titus as he travels through 17 levels of platform jumping action on his quest to rescue Foxy. Never miss a second of the action thanks to a unique eight-way scrolling system. By playing the game well, you will unlock a plethora of bonus levels. With many degrees of difficulty, the challenge of the game is always just right. Should you want to have your friends experience the game, they can with the Cooperative Link Cable mode, where you friend will take control of Titus's cousin Zorro. Help Titus rescue Foxy in TITUS THE FOX.
